channel.description: Recent content in papers on Yuvi Panda

item.title: Paper notes: ‘The impact of syntax colouring on program comprehension’
item.description: I’ve recently started reading more academic papers, and thought it’d be useful to write notes about them and publish them as I go along! This one is for The impact of syntax colouring on program comprehension I was amazed at the amount of prior research it is citing. Why have I not been reading these for the last 10 years of my life? Apparently it is ok to report findings with a sample size of 10 people.
